# EnumExtensions.GetFlags&lt;T&gt; method

Provides an IEnumerable that represents each flag enum values.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<T> GetFlags<T>(this T @enum)
    where T : Enum
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| enum | The enum to get values. |

## Return Value

The IEnumerable that represents each flag enum values.
